<Meta title="Templates/Components/Indicator" />

# Default Indicator Factory

```jsx
const DefaultIndicatorFactory = (props) => {
	const {id, Component = Indicator, children, ...otherProps} = props;

	const ComposedIndicator = R.compose(
		withIndicatorConfigLoader,
		withCriteriaStateListener(id),
		withFacetQueryLoader
	)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedIndicator {...otherProps}>
			{children}
		</ComposedIndicator>
	);
};
```
